name: The Fool
meaning: New beginnings, spontaneity, free spirit. Trust the journey even if you don’t know where it leads.

name: The Magician
meaning: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power. You already have what you need to create magic.

name: The High Priestess
meaning: Intuition, mystery, inner knowledge. Trust your inner voice — it already knows.

name: The Empress
meaning: Beauty, abundance, nature. Nurture what matters most.

name: The Hermit
meaning: Soul-searching, introspection, solitude. The answers lie within.

name: The Tower
meaning: Sudden change, upheaval, awakening. Let go of what must fall.
